    • Method Detail

      • hm1

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> hm1(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> country_names)
        This method will help the user to create a hashMap for the cards. Each card will have a country allocated to it and a card type. Type will be 1,2,3(Artillery, Calvary,Infantry) This hashMap will have the name of the country and its type.
        Parameters:
        country_names - This parameter will have an arrayList provided by the user. The list of the countries included in the game.
        Returns:
        This Method will return a HashMap which will have country as key and type of card as its value.

      • check_cards_deal

        public static int check_cards_deal(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> a,
                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> b,
                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> c)
        This method will check the types of cards and provide reinforcement armies as per the dealing of Cards.
        Parameters:
        a - its type is HashMap. This parameter contains value for card 1.
        b - its type is HashMap. This parameter contains value for card 2.
        c - its type is HashMap. This parameter contains value for card 3.
        Returns:
        This method returns the additional number of Reinforcement armies for a particular Player.

        public static java.lang.String getting_key(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> a,
                                           int value)
        This method will get the Key from its value corresponding to the HashMap.
        Parameters:
        a - This parameter will have HashMap provider by the user.
        value - This parameter will have the value of the HashMap for which will need to find the Key Value
        Returns:
        This Method will Return the Key to the given value if true. if false will return null.

      • trade_card

        public static int trade_card(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> cards)
        This method is used to trade cards and to get value of extra armies
        Parameters:
        cards - This parameter is contains HashMap of cards owned by a player
        Returns:
        This method will return number of armies collected by trading cards

      • get_card

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> get_card(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> cards)
        This method is used to get cards entered by asking player
        Parameters:
        cards - This parameter is contains HashMap of cards owned by a player
        Returns:
        This method will return card entered by player to trade in form of HashMap
